sc.plugin2018

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • sc.plugin2018.Game

  • public class Game
extends <any>
    Minimal game. Basis for new plugins. This class holds the game logic.

      • increaseTurnIfNecessary

        protected boolean increaseTurnIfNecessary(Player nextPlayer)
        In this game, a new round begins when both players made one move. The order in which the players make their move may change.

      • onPlayerJoined

      • checkWinCondition

        public WinCondition checkWinCondition()
        Checks if a win condition in the current game state is met. Checks round limit and end of round (and playerStats). Checks if goal is reached
        Returns:
        WinCondition with winner and reason or null, if no win condition is yet met.

      • checkGoalReached

        public Player checkGoalReached()
        Checks if one player reached the goal (at the end of a round). If both player are in goal, the one with lesser carrots wins, if they both have the same amount, red wins for first entering goal.
        Returns:
        the player who reached the goal or null if no player reached the goal, only returns a player on the end of a round else always null

      • loadFromFile

      • getPlayers

        public java.util.List<SimplePlayer> getPlayers()
        Returns all players. This should always be 2 the startplayer should be first in the List.
        Returns:
        List of all players

      • getPlayerScores

        public java.util.List<PlayerScore> getPlayerScores()
        Returns the PlayerScore for both players
